Name: Bind Monster 4
PassEffect: The air fills with electricity as unseen forces clamp down on the creature. The monster is stunned. Then discard this card and draw a new "Bind Monster" Spell card.
FailEffect: In a moment of panic, you completely forget how to cast the spell. Discard this card (do not draw a replacement).

Name: Blood Pact 5
PassEffect: After the spell takes effect, it quickly dissipates.
FailEffect: Your face grows eerily pale and the room seems to be spinning. Discard this card, do NOT draw a replacement.

Name: Arcane Insight 1
DefaultEffect: A strange compulsion to acton incomplete knowledge drives you (Lore; 2).
PassEffect: You resist your insistent mind; no additional effect.
FailEffect: You begin to execute a plan, only to realize it ends in your death; become Mesmerized.

Name: Arcane Insight 2
DefaultEffect: Further knowledge is just beyond your reach (Lore; 2).
PassEffect: You use the lingering power of the spell to gain new knowledge; you or another investigator within range gains 1 Clue.
FailEffect: The fleeting moment passes; no additional effect.

Name: Arcane Insight 3
DefaultEffect: A strange voice whispers secrets of the future into your mind (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: You interpret fact from fiction; you or another investigator within range gains 1 Clue.
FailEffect: You are disturbed by the voice's strange prophecies; become Mesmerized.

Name: Arcane Insight 4
DefaultEffect: An alien mind greater than your own attempts to subsume you (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: You use the opportunity to learn all it will impart; you or another investigator within range becomes Focused.
FailEffect: You cannot push the mind out; become Mesmerized.

Name: Bind Monster 1
PassEffect: You execute the spell adeptly and are able to cast it without breaking your stride. The monster is stunned. You may move 1 space.
FailEffect: At the last moment, your enemy twists its body, evading the magical contaimnent. The keeper may move the monster 1 space.

Name: Bind Monster 2
PassEffect: The perfectly formed binding takes hold and starts to crush the monster with unseen viciousness. The monster takes 2 damage and is stunned.
FailEffect: A mispmnunciation causes the spell to backfire. You feel the force ofa giant sledgehammer knock you to the floor. Take I damage and I horror.

Name: Bind Monster 3
PassEffect: Arcane energies surge through your body. The rush of power is both frightening and intoxicating. All monsters in this room are stunned. Take 1 horror.
FailEffect: The room grows bitterly cold and you are surrounded by thick black smoke. Take 1 horror. Then place a darkness token in this room.

Name: Bind Monster 5
PassEffect: Mystical forces twist their way around the creature legs. The creature screapns as the binding takes hold. The monster is dealt 1 damage and is stunned.
FailEffect: As the spell starts to congeal, the creature violently shakes, ripping its way out of the unseen shackles. Take 1 horror.

Name: Binding 1
DefaultEffect: The chant rips from your throat, words burning clear lines on the ground (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: Seeing your power physically manifested is thrilling; become Focused.
FailEffect: You feel as if your own mind is being branded: suffer 1 facedowon Horror.

Name: Binding 2
DefaultEffect: In your mind's eye you see a blazing wall of white light before you (Lore; 3)
PassEffect: You pass through the wall and see the answer; gain 1 Clue.
FailEffect: The remnants of your power call you forward; move I space toward a space containing a Restraint.

Name: Binding 3
DefaultEffect: A faint circle appears on the ground before you, flickering with a blue glow (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: The strength of the bonds casts a needed light on your investication; you or another investigator within range gains I Clue.
FailEffect: The fitful light wakes old fears; become Stressed.

Name: Binding 4
DefaultEffect: You aid the incantation with an intricate weaving of your fingers (Lore; 2)
PassEffect: If you pass, you slowly draw your hands apart, but the bonds you forged still linger; no additional effect.
FailEffect: If you fail, your fingers twist awkwardly and a shockwave of arcane energy escapes the spell; become Stunned.

Name: Binding 5
DefaultEffect: Holding the power within your rnind, you speak the words of a lost language (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: The power sinks into the ground, leaving no trace; no additional effect.
FailEffect: The words twist in your mind until you cannot understand what you say; suffer 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Blood Pact 1
PassEffect: Weariness washes away as his body begins to miraculously heal itself. Heal 1 additional damage.
FailEffect: The skin around the recently healed wounds appears translucent and covered in an unidentified viscous slime. Take 1 horror.

Name: Blood Pact 2
PassEffect: You feel the pact's healing energies sinking down into your bones, repairing your body all the way to your core. Discard 1 injury trauma card from any investigator in your room.
FailEffect: You feel as if your brain is on fire. The pain in your head overhelms you. The keeper may draw 1 Trauma card. Then take 1 horror.

Name: Blood Pact 3
PassEffect: You feel the spell threaten to empty your lungs of air as it emanates from you. Every investigator in the room (not including yourself) heals I additional damage.
FailEffect: For a moment you lose control of your body. Your arms and legs mnove of their own accord. The keeper may move you I space.

Name: Blood Pact 4
PassEffect: The wounds have scarred over with a dark, rock-like substance. Heal 2 additional damage, and then take I horror.
FailEffect: The wounds abruptly re-open and blood begins to spray out in a black and red mess. Take 1 damage and 1 horror.

Name: Feed the Mind 1
DefaultEffect: You feel your mind expanding as the universe spins around you (Lore; 2).
PassEffect: You are able to reconcile your new sense of he cosmos with your existing paradigm; no additional effect.
FailEffect: You realize that everything you have known is wring; suffer 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Feed the Mind 2
DefaultEffect: Your own memories flash before your eyes (Lore; 2).
PassEffect: You realize that one of your memories is relevant to the case; gain 1 Clue.
FailEffect: You longer on the worst events of your life; suffer 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Feed the Mind 3
DefaultEffect: For an instant you feel your mind touch the minds of your companions (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: You focus on the connection; you or another investigator within range become Focused.
FailEffect: If you fail, you recoil in revulsion; suffer 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Feed the Mind 4
DefaultEffect: Your mind sharpens to a single crystalline moment (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: If you pass, you see your surroundings with perfect clarity; gain 1 Clue.
FailEffect: If you fail, the moment shatters; flip 1 Horror faceup.

Name: Feed the Mind 5
DefaultEffect: A rush of words, sensations, and thoughts fills you (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: You are able to block out the alien influence and remember yourself; no additional effect.
FailEffect: You struggle to tell your own thoughts from the thoughts of those around you; flip 1 Horror faceup.

Name: Flesh Ward 1
DefaultEffect: You feel an unsettling presence pass into your body (Lore; 2).
PassEffect: You drive out the magic; no additional effect.
FailEffect: Your flesh ripples and twitches of its own accord; the affected investigator suffers 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Flesh Ward 2
DefaultEffect: A strangc energy lingers as thc spell resolves (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: You channel the energy; the affected investigator flips 1 Damage facedown.
FailEffect: The energy dissipates; flip 1 Horror faceup.

Name: Flesh Ward 3
DefaultEffect: You become aware of every facet of your body and those of your companions (Lore; 2).
PassEffect: You see a solution for a malady; you or another investigator within range flip 1 Damage facedown.
FailEffect: You scream in revulsion; suffer 1 facedown Horror,

Name: Flesh Ward 4
DefaultEffect: Every hair on your body stands on end (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: The moment passes and you are yourself again; no additional effect.
FailEffect: Shouting and flailing, you abruptly lash out; flip 1 Damage faceup.

Name: Flesh Ward 5
DefaultEffect: An echo of thc spell passes through you (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: If you pass, you latch onto the echo and cast it again; discard 1 Damage.
FailEffect: If you fail, you lose your concentration; suffer 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Instill Bravery 1
DefaultEffect: A strange darkness enters the edge of your vision (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: The darkness fades; no additional effect.
FailEffect: The darkness whispers; flip 1 Horror faceup.

Name: Instill Bravery 2
DefaultEffect: You glimpse a white ship on a sea of stars (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: A strange sense of peace settles upon you; discard 1 Horror.
FailEffect: The vision vanishes as quickly as it appeared; flip 1 Horror faceup.

Name: Instill Bravery 3
DefaultEffect: The sound of bells rings in your ears (Lore; 3).
PassEffect: You draw comfort from the music of the cosmos; flip 1 Horror facedown.
FailEffect: The sound fades leaving you none the wiser; no additional effect.

Name: Instill Bravery 4
DefaultEffect: You feel as if your mind is twisting and stretching (Lore; 2)
PassEffect: You gain perspective; flip 1 Horror facedown.
FailEffect: You stagger blindly; suffer 1 facedown Damage.

Name: Instill Bravery 5
DefaultEffect: As you finish the spell, your body is wracked with painful coughing (Lore; 2).
PassEffect: You finish the incantation; no additional effect.
FailEffect: The coughing echoes through the spell; suffer 1 facedown Damage.

Name: Poison Mist 1
DefaultEffect: The gas clings to your enemy's skin, causing it to bubble and blister. The monster suffers 1 additional damage.

Name: Poison Mist 2
DefaultEffect: Gas billows from your upraised hands, and you cannot cease the spell. Suffer 1 facedown Horror. Then the monster suffers 1 additional damage and each other monster in your space or an adjacent space suffers 2 damage.

Name: Poison Mist 3
DefaultEffect: The fog forms a hungry face that hunts your enemies. Suffer 1 Horror. Then each other monster in your space or an adjacent space suffers 2 damage.

Name: Poison Mist 4
DefaultEffect: You cough and sputter as you lose all control over the arcane magic. You and each other investigator in your space or an adjacent space suffers 1 facedown Damage. Then the monster suffers 1 additional damage and each other monster in your space or an adjacent space suffers 2 damage.

Name: Poison Mist 5
DefaultEffect: The spell grows too large for your casting, and you barely manage to control it. Each other monster in your space or an adjacent space suffers 1 damage.

Name: Shriveling 1
PassEffect: Your enemy's skin starts to rot before your very eyes, tearing it apar at a molecular level. Take 1 horror and deal 5 damage. If the enemy is a humanoid monster, it is killed.
FailEffect: You send that something has gone terribly wrong. The skin on your left hand starts to melt off. Take 1 damage and 1 horror.

Name: Shriveling 2
PassEffect: Your enemy's flesh pours off its body in a river of decay. You take comfort in knowing that it must be dead as you empty your stomach. Take 1 horror. Then deal 7 damage and stun the monster.
FailEffect: At first it appears that nothing is happening. A second later your vision blurs as you watch your enemy's skin boil. Take 2 horror and deal 3 Damage.

Name: Shriveling 3
PassEffect: Small cuts appear across your enemy's skin . It strikes itself repeatedly trying to escape the effect. Deal and amount of damage to the monster equal to the monster's damage value +2.
FailEffect: Acrid black smoke billows out from the monster as its skin bursts into flames. Deal 2 damage, take 1 horror and place a fire token in this room.

Name: Shriveling 4
DefaultEffect: Your enemy's flesh ripples and reels open. The monster suffers 1 additional damage. Then suffer 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Shriveling 5
DefaultEffect: As you lower your hand, you see a putrid sore on your palm. Suffer 1 facedown damage.

Name: Shriveling 6
DefaultEffect: This spell works exactly as you expect, aside from all the blood. No additional effect.

Name: Shriveling 7
DefaultEffect: You feel for a moment as if the strange boils and lesions have taken hold within your brain. Suffer 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Shriveling 8
PassEffect: A shiver runs cloven your spine as the spell takes effect. Boils cover your enony body and it falls to the ground convulsing. Deal 5 damage and stun the monster.
FailEffect: As you finish the incantation, you wait as absolutely nothing happens. You fear that you have done damage. Take 1 horror.

Name: Shriveling 9
DefaultEffect: The spell seems to resonate and echo within your mind. You direct the resonance at another foe. Suffer 1 facedown Horror. Then another monster within range suffers 3 damage.

Name: Soul Pact 1
PassEffect: The spell briefly allows you to focus on the task in front of you. The effect seems to pass quickly.
FailEffect: You are overcome by fear and mistrust. You reret having ever dabbled in spellcraft.

Name: Soul Pact 2
PassEffect: In your mind's eye you see your entire life up to this point. You know in your heart that you are exactly where you are meant to be. Discard 1 insanity trauma card from any invesitgator in your room.
FailEffect: The entire room shakes ominously. You fear that strange forces conspired against you. The keeper gains 3 threat.

Name: Soul Pact 3
PassEffect: You feel the emotional weight of all your compansions, depending on you for their well-being. Every investigator in the room (not including yourself) heals 1 additional horror.
FailEffect: Time seems to stand still. It may have only been a minute, but you fear that much horror can be found within a single moment. The leeper gais 3 threat.

Name: Soul Pact 4
PassEffect: You hear gentle chimes and feel a cool breeze. They sooth your troubled mind. Heal 1 additional horror.
FailEffect: You feel powerfully alert, your heart pounding in your chest and sweat pouring down your face. Take 1 damage.

Name: Spectral Razor 1
DefaultEffect: Losing control of the energy, it bursts from your hands in a flurry of quick slices. The blood it draws only strengthens its power to cause pain. You and each other investigator in your space suffers 1 facedown Damage. Then the monster suffers 1 additional damage for each investigator in your space.

Name: Spectral Razor 2
DefaultEffect: Twin blades of pure energy carve deep into the heart of your foe. The monster suffers 1 additional damage.

Name: Spectral Razor 3
DefaultEffect: With each recitation, the arcane force carves another thin wound into your flesh. Suffer 1 facedown Damage.

Name: Spectral Razor 4
DefaultEffect: Ellle power lashes from your fingers, carving gruesome wounds into your enemy. Suffer 1 facedown Horror. Then the monster suffers 1 additional damage.

Name: Spectral Razor 5
DefaultEffect: Finishing the incantation, you hope that this power will be enough to protect you. No additional effect.

Name: Wither 1
DefaultEffect: The spell writhes in your and like a living thing, lashing out at random around you. Suffer 1 facedown Damage.

Name: Wither 2
DefaultEffect: For a moment you see yourself in the face of your victim. Suffer 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Wither 3
DefaultEffect: You shout as the spell leaves your body, barely managing to direct its wild power at another foe. Another monster withinrange suffers 2 damage. If no other monsters are within range, another investigator within range suffers 1 facedown Damage.

Name: Wither 4
DefaultEffect: You see the spell ripple and spread from where it hit your target. You suffer 1 facedown damage and the monster suffers 1 additional damage.

Name: Wither 5
DefaultEffect: For once, the spell seems to go exactly as written in that old book. No additional effect.

Name: Wrack 1
DefaultEffect: You feel the pieces of the spell fall effortlessly into place in your mind. You are fightened by how easy it is to bring pain to another being. Suffer 2 facedown horror. Then flip 1 Horror faceup.
FailEffect: Yes

Name: Wrack 2
DefaultEffect: As your enemy suffers, it lashes out, injuring itself and anoyone nearby. You and each other investigator in your space suffer 1 facedown Damage, and the monster suffers 1 additional damage.
FailEffect: Yes

Name: Wrack 3
DefaultEffect: A tremor of searing white pain passes through you. You and each other investigator in your space suffer 1 facedown Damage.
FailEffect: Yes

Name: Wrack 4
DefaultEffect: Your enemy's tormented screams sound almost human. You and each other investigator within range suffer 1 facedown Horror.
